titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain information to the House of Representatives referring to the termination, removal, placement on administrative leave, moved to another department of Federal employees and Inspectors General of agencies.

Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit certain information to the House of Representatives referring to the termination, removal, placement on administrative leave, moved to another department of Federal employees and Inspectors General of agencies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Reported adversely by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 119-58.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 23.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Markup By, Referred To
